npcs.name: Crying Lady
npcs.description: A mysterious Crying Lady is standing in the corner of the room
npcs.long_description: The slender ghost seems to be a crying old mother wearing clothes from the 80s. Her eyes stare into distance, not you, and mumbling something. Maybe I should talk to her.
dialogue: I lost my daughter's gift... I must find it...

item_interactions.dialogue: Thank you... You might find this useful...

npcs.name: Ghost Priest
npcs.long_description: A giant figure, towers over you. He is wearing a raggedy black vestment and is holding a cross upside down. Maybe I should talk to him.
dialogue: Silent gaze, porcelain attire, Who am I, a relic of desire?
Rusted companion, '80s blade, In shadows waiting, what am I made?
Worn by time, a fabric's grace, What am I, in an abandoned space?
